thread.section_title: Summer In Italy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Summer In Italy | www.summerinitaly.com
thread.title: Carol Wallach
thread.title_full: Summer In Italy reviewed by Carol Wallach

author: Carol Wallach
title: Carol Wallach
text:
This is our second time using Summer In Italy and second return to the Amalfi Coast. Everyone we have dealt with has been friendly and extremely helpful. I requested certain features in a villa and it was found. We are so excited to again return for a month stay on the georgeous Amalfi Coast.
Carol Wallach
Boynton Beach, Florida USA
